ygData.subject: Re: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: In North Free Port to Merchant named Jade,  She sells them from 68-89pp ... From: Brett P Gillmore  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
In North Free Port to Merchant named Jade, She sells them from 68-89pp

----- Original Message -----
From: Brett P Gillmore <bgillmor@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 9:30 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor


> From: "Brett P Gillmore" <bgillmor@...>
>
>
>
> When bards play there faction song on merchants it raises it to the max
for that
> player for a short period of time. So maybe that merchant just charges
alot more
> then the rest. I'm a Human druid (bah should have been a half elf or
halfling)
> and she charged the hell outta be it looks like. Oh well not like 138 plat
at
> lvl 33 is gonna set me back that far. Were have people found the 68 plat
ones
> at???
>
